page.title: 06CHURCH ADMINISTRATION
page.content: There is only one vicar for the Cranmer group of parishes. He goes to each of the six churches in the area in turn. He goes to two of the churches once a week and the remaining four churches once every other week. Whatton is the largest of the churches and Thoroton is the smallest in between come Hawksworth, Scarington, Aslockton and Orston. The vicar goes to all six churches because the villages are too small to support separate vicars.This makies life very difficult, as the vicar has the worry of six churches instead of just one. There is a Curate who assists the vicar but his time is mostly spent at the nearby "Whatton Detention Centre". The church is very important in the villages, as most events are organised through it. It also has part control of Aslockton primary school.
